gw.plugin.document

Class IDocumentTemplateSerializer

  • gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IDocumentTemplateSerializer
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Serializes and deserializes document template descriptors. Typically, descriptors persist as XML, as such implementations of this class understand the format of document template descriptors and can read and write them as XML.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor localize(ILocale locale, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
      Given a descriptor, return a localized instance.
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor read(InputStream inputStream)
      De-serialize from the indicated reader to an IDocTemplateDescriptor implementation
      void write(OutputStream outputStream, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor)

      • localize

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor localize(ILocale locale,
                                   IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
        Given a descriptor, return a localized instance.
        Parameters:
        locale - locale for the returned descriptor
        descriptor - descriptor to localize
        Returns:
        localized descriptor

      • read

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor read(InputStream inputStream)
        De-serialize from the indicated reader to an IDocTemplateDescriptor implementation
        Parameters:
        inputStream - A input streamcontaining a serialized template descriptor.
        Returns:
        A class implementing IDocTemplateDescriptor.

      • write

        void write(OutputStream outputStream,
         IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
        Serialize the indicated template descriptor to the Writer.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The outputstream to which the serialized descriptor should be written
        descriptor - The template descriptor to be serialized.
